name: longitude
comment: uniform grid spacing from -179.75 to 179.75 by 0.5

name: latitude
comment: uniform grid spacing from -89.75 to 89.75 by 0.5

name: Z
comment: depth at center of model grid cell. non-uniform vertical spacing

name: time_bnds
long_name: start and stop time of period or time of snapshot

name: latitude_bnds
long_name: latitude bounds of lat-lon grid cells

name: longitude_bnds
long_name: longitude bounds of lat-lon grid cells

name: Z_bnds
long_name: depth bounds of grid cells (depths at top and bottom of grid cells)
comment: identical to model grid depth bounds

name: time
long_name: center time of averaging period or instantaneous time of snapshot
